entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, 5.2°C

Observed at: Victoria Harbour 07:00 AM PST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light early this morning except southeast 30 km/h near Haro Strait this afternoon. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 08 February 2023
